headline: Athene Announces Fixed Income Investor Call
summary: WEST DES MOINES, Iowa, Jan. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Athene Holding Ltd. (“Athene”), a leading retirement services company and subsidiary of Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO), announced it will host a Fixed Income Investor call on Thursday, February 13, 2025 at 9:00AM ET. The call will feature members of Athene’s senior management team, who will provide an update on current business trends, new business origination, the investment portfolio, and capital. An accompanying presentation,
